Waypoint.action:
--## BANK ##--
talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") wait(300,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "deposit all") wait(200,300) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "yes")
Waypoint.label: BANK

Waypoint.action:
--## LOC CHECK ##--
if not islocation() then gotolabel("#005") end
Waypoint.label: Loc

Waypoint.action: --## DEPOSITER ##-- wait(500) reopenbps({ _getid(MainBP), "back"}, {_getid(LootBP), MainBP, true}) wait(1000) opendepot("depot") wait(2200,2500) deposititems(LootBP, 1, 2) wait(200,500) closecontainers() wait(200,500) reopenbps({_getid(MainBP), "back"}, { _getid(LootBP), MainBP, true}, { _getid(ToolsBP), MainBP, true}, { _getid(PotionBP), MainBP, true})
Waypoint.label: DEPOSITER

Script.content:
--## SCRIPT CONFIG ##--
----BP'S---- MainBP = "beach backpack" LootBP = "purple backpack" ToolsBP = "blue backpack" PotionBP = "golden backpack"
---HUNT---- UseUtitoTempo = true MonstersToCast = 4 CapToLeave = 300 MPToLeave = 200 HPToLeave = 50 CapToDropVials = 500
---POTIONS---- MP = "strong mana potion" MPToBuy = 1600 HP = "supreme health potion" HPToBuy = 100
auto(1000,2500) if maround(3, MonstersTable) < 1 and cancast("utani tempo hur") and not ishasted() and not ispzone() then cast("utani tempo hur") end

function dropflask() for i=283, 285 do local flaskCount = countitems(i) if flaskCount > 0 then dropitems(i, flaskCount) end end end
auto(7000,12000) if cap() <= CapToDropVials then dropflask() end

auto(100) if (UseUtitoTempo and UseUtitoTempo == true) and maround(1, MonstersTable) >= MonstersToCast and cancast("utito tempo") then cast("utito tempo") if not cancast("utito tempo") then wait(8000,9000) end end
auto(5000) local tile = gettile(Position:new(posx(), posy()-1, posz())) for i = 1, #tile.items, 1 do local itemid = tile.items[i].id talk(1, itemid) end
